short_summary: Regional Individual Standing Offer from Public Works and Government Services for regional firewood delivery on request
description: Regional Individual Standing Offer from Public Works and Government Services to supply all labour, material and equipment necessary for the delivery of local or kiln dried firewood to Fundy National Park in Alma New Brunswick from September 1st, 2023, to August 31st, 2024, including the option to extend for two additional one-year periods
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title**
--------

RISO Firewood Supply

**Reference Number**
-------------------

WS4035545620

**Publication Date**
-----------------

June 20, 2023

**Expiry Date**
-----------

July 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Procurement Category**
----------------------

Good and Services Delivery (GCS)

**Notice Type**
--------------

Request for Standing Offer (RGA)

**Brief Description**
-----------------

Parks Canada Agency (PC) is soliciting Regional Individual Standing Offers for the supply of local or kiln-dried firewood to Fundy National Park, located in Alma, New Brunswick. The successful contractor will provide all labor, materials, and equipment necessary to prepare and deliver the firewood on an "as-and-when requested" basis during the period of September 1, 2023 to August 31, 2024. The contract may be extended for two additional one-year periods.

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

*   Supply local or kiln-dried firewood to Fundy National Park
*   Provide all labor, materials, and equipment necessary for preparation and delivery
*   Deliver firewood on an "as-and-when requested" basis
*   Meet the specific requirements outlined in the tender document

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

*   New Brunswick

**Regions of Delivery**
----------------------

*   Fundy National Park, Alma, New Brunswick

**Contracting Entity**
-----------------------

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
